description: This file defines a layout component for a Qwik-based frontend application, including request handling and styling.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Handles GET requests, setting cache control headers for client-side caching strategies.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines a Qwik component as the default export, implementing the layout structure.

methods.name: useStyles$
methods.description: Applies CSS styles to the component.
